text: Warren James Jewellers is a British jeweller The company is owned and managed by the brother and sister that founded it with the first shop in Denton, Stockport in 1979. Since then they have grown to 225 shops nationwide and become the largest independent jewellers in the United Kingdom. They aim to sell jewellery at a fraction of the prices of their competitors - passing on savings achieved by their lean operations and large purchasing volumes.Info on website == References == ==External links== *Official Site Category:Jewellery retailers of the United Kingdom Category:Retail companies established in 1979 Category:Clothing companies established in 1979
title: Warren James Jewellers
